00091 
00092         // > 1 because the exe path itself counts as an argument, too!
00093         if(nNumArgs > 1) {
00094                 for(int i = 1; i < nNumArgs; i++) {
00095                         pArg = ppArgs[i];

00097 
00098                         if(strcmp(pArg,"-LOG") == 0) {
00099                                 Debug::bLog = true;
00100                         } else if(strcmp(pArg,"-CD") == 0) {
00101                                 bNoCD = true;

00103                                 bNoLogo = true;

00105                                 bTestingRun = true;

bool Ares::RunningOnWindows7OrVista (  )  [static] 

00395                                     {
00396         static bool W7 = false;
00397         static bool Checked = false;
00398         if(!Checked) {
00399                 Checked = true;
00400                 OSVERSIONINFO osvi;
00401 
00402                 ZeroMemory(&osvi, sizeof(OSVERSIONINFO));
00403                 osvi.dwOSVersionInfoSize = sizeof(OSVERSIONINFO);
00404                 GetVersionEx(&osvi);
00405 
00406                 W7 = (osvi.dwMajorVersion == 6)/* && (osvi.dwMinorVersion >= 1)*/;
00407         }
00408         return W7;
00409 }

CellClass *  pDestination,
AircraftTypeClass *  pPlaneType,
TypeList< TechnoTypeClass * > *  pTypes,
TypeList< int > *  pNums 
) [static]

00141         if(pNums && pTypes &&
00142                 pNums->Count == pTypes->Count &&
00143                 pNums->Count > 0 &&
00144                 pOwner && pPlaneType && pTarget)
00145         {
00146                 ++Unsorted::SomeMutex;
00147                 AircraftClass* pPlane = reinterpret_cast<AircraftClass*>(pPlaneType->CreateObject(pOwner));
00148                 --Unsorted::SomeMutex;
00149 
00150                 pPlane->Spawned = true;
00151 
00152                 //Get edge (direction for plane to come from)
00153                 int edge = pOwner->StartingEdge;
00154                 if(edge < edge_NORTH || edge > edge_WEST) {
00155                         edge = pOwner->Edge;
00156                         if(edge < edge_NORTH || edge > edge_WEST) {
00157                                 edge = edge_NORTH;
00158                         }
00159                 }
00160 
00161                 //some ASM magic, seems to retrieve a random cell struct at a given edge
00162                 CellStruct spawn_cell;
00163 
00164                 MapClass::Global()->PickCellOnEdge(&spawn_cell, edge, (CellStruct *)0xB04C38, (CellStruct *)0xB04C38, 4, 1, 0);
00165 
00166                 pPlane->QueueMission(mission_ParadropApproach, false);
00167 
00168                 if(pTarget) {
00169                         pPlane->SetTarget(pTarget);
00170                 }
00171 
00172                 CoordStruct spawn_crd = {(spawn_cell.X << 8) + 128, (spawn_cell.Y << 8) + 128, 0};
00173 
00174                 ++Unsorted::SomeMutex;
00175                 bool bSpawned = pPlane->Put(&spawn_crd, dir_N);
00176                 --Unsorted::SomeMutex;
00177 
00178                 if(bSpawned) {
00179                         pPlane->HasPassengers = true;
00180                         for(int i = 0; i < pTypes->Count; i++) {
00181                                 TechnoTypeClass* pTechnoType = pTypes->GetItem(i);
00182 
00183                                 //only allow infantry and vehicles
00184                                 eAbstractType WhatAmI = pTechnoType->WhatAmI();
00185                                 if(WhatAmI == abs_UnitType || WhatAmI == abs_InfantryType) {
00186                                         for(int k = 0; k < pNums->Items[i]; k++) {
00187                                                 FootClass* pNew = reinterpret_cast<FootClass*>(pTechnoType->CreateObject(pOwner));
00188                                                 pNew->Remove();
00189                                                 pPlane->Passengers.AddPassenger(pNew);
00190                                         }
00191                                 }
00192                         }
00193                         pPlane->NextMission();
00194                 } else {
00195                         if(pPlane) {
00196                                 GAME_DEALLOC(pPlane);
00197                         }
00198                 }
00199         }
